*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas Carter to Austin, Eatonton, Ga., April 7, 1830. Wants information about Texas. Wants to move with family of 30 (20 being "black servants").*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Eatenton putnam County Georgia*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="04-07-1830"> 7th April 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colonel Stephen. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*. Dear Sir I am informed by *person_mentioned*Capt James Lusk*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*State of Ohio*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Butler County*/location_mentioned* that he visited *location_mentioned*Texes */location_mentioned*about *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">four or five years past*/date_mentioned* and that he became personally acquainted with you and yur province my friend *person_mentioned*Lusk */person_mentioned*gave me leave to make use of his name in addressing you, my motive for this address is that I wish to emigrate to your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*from the history of *location_mentioned*Texes */location_mentioned*I am well pleasd and from the information of *person_mentioned*Lusk */person_mentioned*and others that have viewed the *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*I believe I Shall like your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*Dear Sir I now wish you to inform me by letter as Soon as practicable on what terms I may obtain *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*in your province that I may move my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*thirty in number twenty of my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*is *person_mentioned*black servants*/person_mentioned* the balance ar a *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned* my oldes *person_mentioned*Son */person_mentioned*is 18 years old a *person_mentioned*daughter */person_mentioned*that [is] nearly 17 years of age If I Should emigrate in all probability a considerable number of respectable *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*State of Georgia*/location_mentioned* will probable i migrate with me Some macannick of difrent Trades Some members of the Baptist and Methodist Episcopal Church Some off hoom are welthy and ranks amongs those in the first Circle in this *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*please give mee a Sketch of the Constitution of your province with a Sketch of a code of your laws and whether a *person_mentioned*Slave*/person_mentioned* holding *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*or not and with regard to religion whether a man will bee allowed to worship agreeable to the dictates of his own conciens or not I feel disposed to visit your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*So Soon as I can have a answer from you from *person_mentioned*Capt Lusk*/person_mentioned*s Statement to mee it is your wish for your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*to bee Settled with good Society as soon as practicable If I should not bee answered by you I Shall visit your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*in the cours of twelve months for the purpose of viewing the *location_mentioned*cuntry */location_mentioned*and if I Should like make arangement to emigrate there— I was born in the *location_mentioned*State of Virginia*/location_mentioned* my father move[d] to the then *location_mentioned*frontiers of Georgia*/location_mentioned* when I was a Smal boy in the year*date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1782"> 1782*/date_mentioned* if I Should move I can bring with mee recommendations from his *person_mentioned*Excellency the Governor*/person_mentioned* from the *person_mentioned*Judges of Court*/person_mentioned* and the highes *person_mentioned*Military officers*/person_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned* your answer in Some way will bee thankfully received directed to *location_mentioned*Eatenton putnam County State of Georgia*/location_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Capt Lusk*/person_mentioned* told me that I might do well to write to you on the Subject and was of opinion that you would bee pleased to See *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Georgia*/location_mentioned* emigrating to your *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*I have therefore troubled you with this address with due respect your humble Servt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas Carter*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To the*person_mentioned* Honourable Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Colonel Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Province of Texes*/location_mentioned* in the Town of *location_mentioned*Saint philip D. Austin*/location_mentioned*'s on the *location_mentioned*River Rio bra*/location_mentioned*sses by the way of *location_mentioned*Alexandria Louisinia*/location_mentioned**/p*
